3.name: Narration
3.text:
Suddenly, a black flash of lightning cuts through
the space. A portal appears in the trial
labyrinth, connecting the demon world and the
human world. From that ominous gateway of demonic
power, a great demon with pale skin is summoned.

4.name: Narration
4.text:
Seeking destruction, blood, and death, a Greater
Demon descends. The roar of slaughter becomes the
signal for battle───!

8.name: Narration
8.text:
The skin of the demon, which repels even steel, is
torn apart, and blue blood gushes into the
genitals. A blow, swung with the spirit of a
warrior's determination, cuts through the blue
skin. Instead of a voice of agony, it lets out a
different sound, and its massive body trembles.

9.name: Narration
9.text:
The mighty demon is gradually cornered by the
adventurers who have overcome numerous deadly
battles.

10.name: Narration
10.text:
Just as its claws, capable of felling even giants,
are about to strike, a golden dragon sinks its
teeth into the demon's wrist. In the next moment,
the demon's hand is torn to pieces and dances
through the air.

11.name: Narration
11.text:
And then, a steel blade thrust into the head of
the demon, which had lost its arm in self-defense.
The sword, swung with enough force to bisect the
head, continues to cut through the chest of the
great demon.

12.name: Narration
12.text:
The demon, whose life in this world has been
ended, returns to dust.

13.name: Erick
13.text: "I found it...! This is definitely it!"

14.name: Sol
14.text:
"Ooooo... This is... this is the Dragon Slayer...
Amazing, but scary!!"

15.name: Erick
15.text: "Ah, I see. Since Sol-chan is also a Slayer..."

17.name: Eni-sensei
17.text:
"There is no mistake. This is the legendary...
Yamano's sword. With this, we finally have a
chance of winning against the Red Dragon.
However... even so, the prospect of winning is
slim..."
